mapper.select: SELECT RENTACC_NO, RENT_BOARD_NO, RENTACC_PROCESS, RENTACC_START_DATE, RENTACC_END_DATE, RENTACC_ACC, RENTACC_COMMENT, RENTACC_NICKNAME FROM RENT_ACC ORDER BY RENTACC_NO DESC

SELECT RENTACC_NO, RENT_BOARD_NO, RENTACC_PROCESS, RENTACC_START_DATE, RENTACC_END_DATE, RENTACC_ACC, RENTACC_COMMENT, RENTACC_NICKNAME FROM RENT_ACC WHERE RENT_BOARD_NO IN (SELECT RENT_BOARD_NO FROM RENT_BOARD WHERE RENT_WRITER = #{writer}) ORDER BY RENTACC_NO DESC

SELECT RENTACC_NO, RENT_BOARD_NO, RENTACC_PROCESS, RENTACC_START_DATE, RENTACC_END_DATE, RENTACC_ACC, RENTACC_COMMENT, RENTACC_NICKNAME FROM RENT_ACC WHERE RENTACC_NICKNAME = #{writer} ORDER BY RENTACC_NO DESC
